name: EdFi
description: What is the project about? The term comes from the roots of cryptocurrency users abbreviating categories such as Decentralized Finance (DeFi) & Gamified Finance (GameFi). EdFi aims to become an educational ecosystem for all things crypto based. EdFi aims to provide the necessary tools for Web3 Education and become a provider for educational content. What makes your project unique? EdFi uses AI technology, DeFi & Blockchain elements to connect the gap between Web 2 Education & Web 3 Education. History of your project. EdFi is a fair launched, community driven project which focuses on fair distribution of the token. We believe that Educational Finance is an important category in the crypto space Whatâ€™s next for your project? We are rolling out products on our EdFi ecosystem, EdFi Suite which these products are tools for users to utilize and get more educated in the Web 3 space. What can your token be used for? EdFi token is extremely important to its ecosystem. Users can stake their tokens and earn APR, they will also need it to subscribe to the platform in order to use our products.
